<title level="1" right="Skill " pfs="">[Warfare](/Skills.aspx?ID=32)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 530</row>

Warfare reflects a kingdom’s readiness to mobilize its military forces against its enemies—be they lone rampaging monsters or entire armies bent on invasion. Warfare has no exclusive skill activities as presented in this appendix, though it can be used with some general skill activities. Warfare is used extensively to resolve mass combat; see Appendix 3 for details on your options for the use of Warfare skill.

<title level="2">Warfare Untrained General Actions</title>

- [Focused Attention](/Skills.aspx?ID=14&General=true) 

- [New Leadership](/Skills.aspx?ID=15&General=true) 

- [Quell Unrest](/Skills.aspx?ID=17&General=true) 

<title level="2">Warfare Trained General Actions</title>

- [Pledge of Fealty](/Skills.aspx?ID=16&General=true) 

<title level="2">Related Feats</title>

To see a list of Feats related to Warfare, [click here](/feats?include-traits=skill&exclude-traits=archetype&include-skills=warfare&sort=level-asc%3Bname-asc).
